title: where to find champion stats
body: ive been playing league a long time and would like to know where to find all the kills and cs and towers ive killed as that champion where would i go to find this?

replies.body: Some of that information is made available in the legacy client's profile section.  You can also get some of these stats through your [match history](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/227127541) page.  There are some solid fan/third party sites too out there that offer some solid info, though, keep in mind they may not always be accurate or updated.  I hope that helps!
